name: The phantom_building
description:
My first game boy game, 

In this game you are playing as the adventurer rabbit Babble.

Her friend Tuffi is a bossy boots bun-bun who demands her to enter

his dad's old processing plant.  They used to grow and can carrots...  But now it

sits there as a former place of business.

There is a psychopath in that old building a janitor who went crazy and grew to resent and hate rabbitkin because of all the work he has provided only to be ignored by Tuffi's father.

I hope you will enjoy this short game!
